Audio.Locality: Reserva Ecológica de Guapi Açu (REGUA), RJ
Audio.Author: Eric DeFonso
Audio.Comments: Extended call sequence of staccato notes. At the wetland pond near the volunteer dorms and lodge.bird-seen:yesplayback-used:no
